Class EnsembleAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclec.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm
      • net.sf.jclec.algorithm.PopulationAlgorithm
        • net.sf.jclec.algorithm.classic.SG
          • net.sf.jclec.algorithm.classic.SGE
            • eme.EnsembleAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, net.sf.jclec.IAlgorithm, net.sf.jclec.IConfigure, net.sf.jclec.IPopulation, net.sf.jclec.ISystem, net.sf.jclec.JCLEC, net.sf.jclec.util.random.IRandGenFactory

    public class EnsembleAlgorithm
extends net.sf.jclec.algorithm.classic.SGE
    Author:
    Jose M. Moyano: jmoyano@uco.es Class implementing the evolutionary algorithm EME. It extends the SGE class from JCLEC.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Number of active labels in each base classifier

      Number of base classifiers of the ensemble

      Threshold for voting process prediction
      private static long serialVersionUID

      private java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,mulan.classifier.MultiLabelLearner> tableClassifiers
      Table that stores all built base classifiers
      private java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> tableFitness
      Table that stores the fitness of all evaluated individuals
      private boolean useCoverage
      Indicates if the coverage ratio is used in fitness
      private boolean useValidationSet
      Indicates if a validation set is used to evaluate the individuals If it is TRUE, a different dataset is used to build and to evaluate the individuals The dataset to evaluate may be totally different or include more instances to the training one If it is FALSE, the same dataset is used to build and to evaluate the individuals
      private boolean variable
      Indicates if the number of active labels is variable for each base classifier

        Table that stores the fitness of all evaluated individuals

      • useValidationSet

        private boolean useValidationSet
        Indicates if a validation set is used to evaluate the individuals If it is TRUE, a different dataset is used to build and to evaluate the individuals The dataset to evaluate may be totally different or include more instances to the training one If it is FALSE, the same dataset is used to build and to evaluate the individuals

      • useCoverage

        private boolean useCoverage
        Indicates if the coverage ratio is used in fitness

        Get the threshold used for prediction in the ensemble
        Returns:

      • isVariable

        public boolean isVariable()
        Get if the number of labels in each base classifier is variable At the moment, only the fixed version has been proved
        Returns:
        FALSE if the number of labels for each base classifier is fixed, and TRUE if it wold be variable

      • getUseValidationSet

        public boolean getUseValidationSet()
        Get if the validation dataset is used
        Returns:
        TRUE if a different dataset is used to evaluate the individuals, and FALSE if the same than to build them is used

      • getTableClassifiersSize

        public int getTableClassifiersSize()
        Get the size of the TableClassifiers. That means the number of base classifiers that have been built over the evolutionary process.
        Returns:
        Size of the table storing the built base classifiers

      • getTableFitnessSize

        public int getTableFitnessSize()
        Get the size of the TableFitness. That means the number of individuals that have been evaluated over the evolutionary process.
        Returns:
        Size of the table storing the fitness of the individuals
